att.name: smtp_host
att.description: The SMTP host from where emails will be sent

att.name: smtp_port
att.description: The SMTP port from where the emails are sent

att.name: smtp_username
att.description: The username used to log in to SMTP host

att.name: smtp_password
att.description: The password of the user specified in "smtp_username"

att.name: smtp_from_id
att.description: From this ID, the mails will be sent

att.name: smtp_from_name
att.description: The name shown for the ID

att.name: use_ssl
att.description: Do you want to use SSL communication?

att.name: use_start_tls
att.description: Do you want to use TLS?

att.name: smtp_to_address_DFWaaS
att.description: Email IDs to send email to whenever a new DFW request is completed

att.name: smtp_to_address_LDAPaaS
att.description: Email IDs to send email for LDAPaaS Requests

att.name: smtp_to_address_FQDNaaS
att.description: Email IDs to send email to, for FQDNaaS Workflows

att.name: smtp_to_address_LBaaS
att.description: Email IDs to send email to, for LBaaS Workflows
